properties.Query: SELECT "date" , serial_number, model, failure, vault_id, s9_power_on_hours FROM FLOWFILE WHERE vault_id <> 'vault_id' AND s9_power_on_hours IS NOT NULL AND s9_power_on_hours <> ''
